Translations.Text: All vizagx submit Viv Etern those who sxargx their transgressions fail
As por those worked righteousness while kred ili ne hav tim de injustice adversity
Ni tiel revealed gxi Arabic Quran ni cited en gxi all kinds da prophecies ili sav gxi kauxz them sorb heed
Exalted est DI nur prav Regx! Ne rush uttering Quran gxi revealed vi dir My Lord increase my knowledge
Ni tested Adam en des preter, li forges ni trov him indecisive
Recall ti ni dir al angxel, Fal prostrate Adam. Ili fal prostrate Satan; li rifuz
Ni tiam dir O Adam this est enemy de vi your wife. Ne let him evict vi Paradise lest vi igx miserable
Vi garanti neniam hunger therein nor ir unsheltered
Nor vol vi soif therein nor sufer any hejt
Diabl flustr him dir O Adam let me montr vi arb eternity unending kingship
Ili mangx el gxi, whereupon their korp igx visible al them ili pen kovr foli Paradise! Adam tiel disobeyed his Lord fal
Subsequently his Lord chose him redeemed him direkt him
Li dir Ir down therefrom all da vi! Vi est enemies de 1 another When guidance ven vi Me anyone sekv My guidance ne ir astray nor sufer any mizer
As por 1 who disregards My message li hav amiserable life ni resurrect him Tag Resurrection blind
Li dir My Lord do gxi vi summon me blind when mi did uz est seer
Li dir vi forges our revelations when ili ven vi vi tuj forges
Ni tiel requite those transgress rifuz kred en revelations their Lord retribution Hereafter est far mav everlasting
Gxi Does ever occur them kiel many previous generaci ni annihilated Ili tuj marsx hejm de those antaux them. These est sign those posed intelligence
Se ne est your Lord's predetermined plan ili jugx tuj
Do est pacient en des vizagx de their utterances lauxd glor your Lord antaux sunrise antaux sunset! Dum nokt glor Him tro as ambaux ends tag vi est felicx
Ne covet ki ni bestowed any ali popol! Such est temporary ornaments this life whereby ni put them test ki your Lord proviz por vi est far put everlasting
Vi enjoin your famili observ kontakt prayers (Salat) steadfastly persevere en doing tial. Ni ne pet vi any provisions ni est des unu proviz por vi. ultimate triumf aparten al des righteous
Ili dir li nur montr us mirakl el his Lord ili ne ricev sufficient mirakl previous messages
Hav ni annihilated them this ili dir Our Lord hav Vi send messenger us ni sekv Your revelations evit this fi humiliation
Dir All da us waiting wait vi testament surely trov out who est gxust path who ver direkt
